alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 5:51AM AKST until January 16 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will increase tonight over higher terrain and continue into Tuesday. The worst conditions will be over Steese Highway Summits. Snow falling today will taper off tonight but redevelop again late Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
